short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get the latest cryptocurrency prices in your browser on each new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cryptonima is a new tab extension keeping you updated with major Crypto currencies.
On each new tab you shall have a beautiful Anime background, Crypto currencies and a search field for your daily search needs.

By clicking "Add To Chrome", you accept and agree to install the Cryptonima Extension and set the new tab search to the one provided by the service.
The search features within the extension will be provided by Bing.

Backgrounds for Cryptonima Extension were taken from https://www.animenbo.com/2021/01/free-anime-images-for-commercial-use.html

You can review our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy in the following links:
https://americads.com/terms.html
https://americads.com/privacy.html
